name: plugdj-scrobbler
title: Plug.dj Scrobbler
description: Firefox extension to scrobble tracks from Plug.dj.
author: Jason Puglisi (https://www.puglisi.im/) <jason@puglisi.im>

preferences.name: lastfmScrobbling
preferences.title: Last.fm Scrobbling
preferences.description: Whether or not to scrobble tracks from Plug.dj to Last.fm.

preferences.name: lastfmUpdating
preferences.title: Last.fm Now Playing Updating
preferences.description: Whether or not to send now playing information from Plug.dj to Last.fm.
